column4: Hi, Have been trying to network two ubuntu pcs for two days now and getting nowhere, Am nub so probably something simple that i don't know but i'm pulling my hair out, Please Help!
Can you ping the one machine from the other?
Give that a shot firstly mate
am trying to create a wireless adhoc network between netbook and desktop
I cant even get the wireless up
You might look through the settings in Network Manager to be sure
Ive tried everything that my limited experiece allows, :)
It makes no sense to me. I can at least get my netbook to connect to my windows wireless network but then i can't ping the other machines either

Something you can try is to connect the machine to ethernet, and do System => Administration => Hardware Drivers => check to see if any drivers for the dongle are found (of course, you have to have the dongle IN at the time)
opened the file but can't see the drivers that i am looking for, dose this mean that they are not blacklisted at all?
How's about this - when you boot with the liveCD, does the wireless work?
hold the phone, i'll try, back in a min
